remarks: Composition in the category of non-unital rings. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngccofvalOLD.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
rngccoOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngccoOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
rngccoOLD.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
rngccoOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X RngHomo Y ) ) $.
rngccoOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Y RngHomo Z ) ) $.
rngccoOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) F ) = ( G o. F ) ) $.
